items.title: Port
items.summary: The port to connect your client/listeners.

items.title: Replication Mode
items.summary: Connect to the database either through IPv4 or IPv6. Disregarded if database host is an IP address (e.g., `127.0.0.1`) and recommended if database host is a name (e.g., `db.abcd.supabase.co`) to prevent potential non-existent domain (NXDOMAIN) errors.
